metadata.dc:author: Benavent-Corai, Veronique
García-Callejo, F Javier
Marco-Algarra, Jaime
Santonja-López, Nuria
Minguell-González, Paula
Muñoz-Fernández, Noelia
metadata.dc:description: We present five cases of tonsillitis secondary to Yersinia enterocolitica. No response to commonly-used antibiotics and continuous professional contact with pigs were common. The definitive diagnosis was established by bacteriological isolation on tonsil tissue samples.
metadata.dc:title: Amigdalitis por Yersinia enterocolitica.
[Yersinia enterocolitica tonsillitis].
